mapper.select: select attentionid, user.userid, user.username, attentionuserid, u.username from attention join user u on attention.attentionuserid = u.userid, user where attention.userid = u.userid
select attentionuserid from attention where attention.userid = #{userid} and attentionuserid = (select userid from user where user.username = #{nowimageusername})
mapper.insert: insert into `attention`(userid, attentionuserid) VALUES (#{userid}, (select userid from user where username = #{nowimageusername}))
mapper.delete: delete from `attention` where userid = #{userid} and attentionuserid = (select userid from user where username = #{nowimageusername})
